name: Hentai Harem
description:
Introduction

A casual and relaxing puzzle game where you'll unlock nearly 30 new images of 10 beautiful anime women from around the globe. Complete the puzzles (or cheat!) to unlock their undressed versions. From the bikinis on the beach to strict school teachers, we've got somebody for everybody at Hentai Harem.

Game Features

  • Every girl comes with at least one alternate state of undress, most have 2!
  • Press the 'C' key to instantly finish any level you want. We won't tell anybody.
  • Play one handed. Just in case you want to...have a coffee or something.
  • No time limits or scores. Relax, chill, and take your time.
  • No censorship in the game.
  • A fun puzzle experience that's not too hard, not too easy. And you can always cheat anyway!
